Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.MultiGreets
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("multigreets", "Set or manage MultiGreets.")]
public class SlashMultiGreets : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<MultiGreetService>, IInteractionModuleBase
